input.sentences: awww.. this is our puppy cuddles
he loves halloween time of the year .
cuddles loves to play in the yard
today cuddles is playing in the leaves
cuddles wants to go for a walk in this photo
output.sentences: It was this puppies first Halloween.
It was his owner's favorite holiday.
They played in the fall leaves with such joy.
Almost too much, as they lay in the leaves, exhausted.
Trick or treating couldn't get any better when they were together.
